verses.verse: Now these<WH428> are the names<WH8034> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> which came<WH935> into Egypt;<WH4714> every man<WH376> and his household<WH1004> came<WH935> with Jacob.<WH3290>
Reuben,<WH7205> Simeon,<WH8095> Levi,<WH3878> and Judah,<WH3063>
Issachar,<WH3485> Zebulun,<WH2074> and Benjamin,<WH1144>
Dan,<WH1835> and Naphtali,<WH5321> Gad,<WH1410> and Asher.<WH836>
And all<WH3605> the souls<WH5315> that came<WH3318> out of the loins<WH3409> of Jacob<WH3290> were seventy<WH7657> souls:<WH5315> for Joseph<WH3130> was in Egypt<WH4714> already.
And Joseph<WH3130> died,<WH4191> and all<WH3605> his brothers,<WH251> and all<WH3605> that generation.<WH1755>

And the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> were fruitful,<WH6509> and increased<WH8317> abundantly,<WH8317> and multiplied,<WH7235> and waxed exceeding<WH3966> mighty;<WH6105> and the land<WH776> was filled<WH4390> with them.
Now there arose<WH6965> up a new<WH2319> king<WH4428> over<WH5921> Egypt,<WH4714> which<WH834> knew<WH3045> not Joseph.<WH3130>
And he said<WH559> to his people,<WH5971> Behold,<WH2009> the people<WH5971> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> are more<WH7227> and mightier<WH6099> than we:

Come<WH3051> on, let us deal wisely<WH2449> with them; lest<WH6435> they multiply,<WH7235> and it come<WH1961> to pass, that, when<WH3588> there falls<WH7122> out any war,<WH4421> they join<WH3254> also<WH1571> to our enemies,<WH8130> and fight<WH3898> against us, and so get<WH5927> them up out of the land.<WH776>

Therefore they did set<WH7760> over<WH5921> them taskmasters<WH8269> <WH4522> to afflict<WH6031> them with their burdens.<WH5450> And they built<WH1129> for Pharaoh<WH6547> treasure<WH4543> cities,<WH5892> Pithom<WH6619> and Raamses.<WH7486>
But the more<WH3651> they afflicted<WH6031> them, the more<WH3651> they multiplied<WH7235> and grew.<WH6555> And they were grieved<WH6973> because<WH6440> of the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>
And the Egyptians<WH4714> made the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> to serve<WH5647> with rigor:<WH6531>

And they made their lives<WH2416> bitter<WH4843> with hard<WH7186> bondage,<WH5656> in mortar,<WH2563> and in brick,<WH3843> and in all<WH3605> manner of service<WH5656> in the field:<WH7704> all<WH3605> their service,<WH5656> wherein<WH834> they made them serve,<WH5647> was with rigor.<WH6531>

And the king<WH4428> of Egypt<WH4714> spoke<WH559> to the Hebrew<WH5680> midwives,<WH3205> of which<WH834> the name<WH8034> of the one<WH259> was Shiphrah,<WH8236> and the name<WH8034> of the other<WH8145> Puah:<WH6326>

And he said,<WH559> When you do the office of a midwife<WH3205> to the Hebrew<WH5680> women, and see<WH7200> them on the stools;<WH70> if it be a son,<WH1121> then you shall kill<WH4191> him: but if<WH518> it be a daughter,<WH1323> then she shall live.<WH2425>
But the midwives<WH3205> feared<WH3372> God,<WH430> and did<WH6213> not as the king<WH4428> of Egypt<WH4714> commanded<WH1696> them, but saved<WH2421> the men children<WH3206> alive.<WH2421>

And the king<WH4428> of Egypt<WH4714> called<WH7121> for the midwives,<WH3205> and said<WH559> to them, Why<WH4069> have you done<WH6213> this<WH2088> thing,<WH1697> and have saved<WH2421> the men children<WH3206> alive?<WH2421>

And the midwives<WH3205> said<WH559> to Pharaoh,<WH6547> Because<WH3588> the Hebrew<WH5680> women<WH802> are not as the Egyptian<WH4713> women;<WH802> for they are lively,<WH2422> and are delivered<WH3205> ere<WH2962> the midwives<WH3205> come<WH935> in to them.
Therefore God<WH430> dealt well<WH3190> with the midwives:<WH3205> and the people<WH5971> multiplied,<WH7235> and waxed very<WH3966> mighty.<WH6105>
And it came<WH1961> to pass, because<WH3588> the midwives<WH3205> feared<WH3372> God,<WH430> that he made<WH6213> them houses.<WH1004>

And Pharaoh<WH6547> charged<WH6680> all<WH3605> his people,<WH5971> saying,<WH559> Every<WH3605> son<WH1121> that is born<WH3209> you shall cast<WH7993> into the river,<WH2975> and every<WH3605> daughter<WH1323> you shall save<WH2421> alive.<WH2421>
